title: Ryze seriously needs a buff
body:
Like ryze right now is totally dependent on a good early game with like 70-80 cs 10 minutes and maybe a kill
He is good mid game but does well late game only and only if he has a good early

What im trying to say is ryze can never have that good early game. he is shut down by ganks or having the lane shoved towards his side or something. recently i saw my diamond friend up against a ryze top and man my friend was fed soo hard he just solo carried and then ryze goes sightstone and weird stuff, i think he got 9 reports maybe

Some things you can do is like

1. buff his mana ratios to what it was earlier
2. make his passive like on casting 4 spells so you can actually use it
3. i am ok with the fact that he has no gapcloser but you can makes his q slow or increase the root on his w so that he doesnt die to every single gank
4. lower his w cooldown actually all his abilities cuz if the lane is shoved he can ult the wave so he aint miss all of the cs
5. buff his mana ratios to what it was earlier repeated to tell you that that is a must

AP ryze is always outclassed by mana ryze as

VALUE ON GOLD
If you take the same amount of mana and ability power you can buy with 200 gold then it would be (ON AN AVERAGE):
200 Gold= 100 Mana
Q - 2-4
W - 2.5
E - 2

200 Gold=9.2 Ability Power
Q - 5
W - 3.5
E - 2.5

With 200 gold you choose between:
+100 Mana +6.5/8.5 damage OR +11.00 damage

Why Mana Is Better

1. You don't only get the same damage from the same gold but you also gain additional mana to use even more spells.
2. The Mana you bought will later on give you even more damage when you finally upgrade your Tear Of The Goddess to Archangel Staff.
3. Enemies will get mind blown when they see how low your Ability Power is and actually UNDERESTIMATE your damage output.

SO PLEASE WHATEVER YOU DO BUFF HIS MANA RATIOS
AND ALSO PUT A FEW OF THE OTHER RECOMMENDATIONS IN IT

replies.body: If you saw Faker play Ryze in Worlds, you'll know he doesn't need a buff at all :p
as a champion who is retarded late game I feel that Ryze's win rate is fine as is in the League of Early Game meta.

Well you must know that ryze mid has a 41.56% win rate. Thats last but 1(kassadin top)
His top win rate is like 45.28% which too is not any good, that is 3rd least at top lane


http://champion.gg/statistics/#?roleSort=Top&sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend
Thats because top laners that are op right now are lane bullies and almost all of them counter him. ofc his win rate is going to be low in this meta.
A late game monster shouldn't have a good lane phase
exactly! (all turn to look at vayne)

He is op late game but is he is the most extremely item dependent ap top laner. To get those items he needs a decent early. But ryze can never accomplish that dream. So if you get like 40 cs and two death your scaling is basically stopped. Not only that he cant provide much ultility to team and is he is behind he cant deal damage too.

You understand what he is right? a late game hyper carry. His aim is literally to survive the laning phase and get his roa and tear stacking. He is not meant to be strong early. 
> 
buff his mana ratios to what it was earlier
make his passive like on casting 4 spells so you can actually use it
i am ok with the fact that he has no gapcloser but you can makes his q slow or increase the root on his w so that he doesnt die to every single gank
lower his w cooldown actually all his abilities cuz if the lane is shoved he can ult the wave so he aint miss all of the cs
>
Buff his mana ratios?  You understand the concept of being able to kill a ryze don't you, he already does enough damage in my opinion and if he gets crushed in lane he should be able to just have a fully stacked tear and roa and be able to one combo people.
His passive is fine, there is actually strategy to it, being able to manage it and not having it activate in one rotation is a part of what makes it balanced. You don't even need to hit your q to activate it you know? not that hard to manage.
Slow on q. No, just no, point and click snare is enough.
Lower his w cooldown? DID YOU EVEN SEE ****ING PERMA SNARE RYZE? its not getting lowered ever.
Tl;dr, ryze is a hyper carry and should lose the laning phase to most champs except his counter picks, Hes in a alright spot at the moment and has fair counter play, imo he is one of riots balanced champions at the moment.
FYI, if you have 40 cs and two deaths by the end of the laning phase you probably either picking him into a lane bully which he is meant to lose to or you are really bad at ryze.
